author: timbeiko
content:
ICYMI, the Dencun mainnet announcement post is out: https://blog.ethereum.org/2024/02/27/dencun-mainnet-announcement

The fork is scheduled for epoch `269568` (March 13, 2024, 13:55 UTC) and announcement contains all the recommended client versions. 

We'll have a livestream to watch the fork activate: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iL0cZRkyrV0
